name: Ora Bolas!
description:
Your objective is to collect the balls with the color indicated in the top-left label.

Note that a mouse is required to play this game. You'll need to point the cursor to the balls.

This is an extended version of a game made for Ludum Dare 31.

Original version: http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-31/?action=preview&uid=46558

Source code at PlayCanvas: https://playcanvas.com/project/333967
